course_description: Prerequisite: EPI 530 or EPI 504. Provides training in domestic and international public health aspects of tuberculosis, its epidemiology and diagnosis, theory and practice of treatment and means of prevention in developed and developing countries, and the interaction between HIV and tuberculosis. Cross listed with EPI 542.
sections: Class Nbr: 4586, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Th 10:15a-12:05p, Instructor: Gandhi/Vernon, Status: Open
